title: What is your opinion of the Treaty of Paris? Did the Filipino benefitted with the Treaty? ? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have always though of the Treaty of Paris as the settlement at the end of WW2. The Philippines was under the US military rule before WW2 but it was recognized as an independent nation just 1 year before that Treaty of Paris. But there was yet another Treaty of Paris held in 1898 Which marked the arrival of the US dominion over the Philippines. Not sure if individuals benefited much of that reassignment of the foreign domination over the island, but it could have been worse, because Japan was close to the islands too
